channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: ðŸ”´ 14:00 Air alarm to Khmelnytsky region follow further messages.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 14:00 Air alarm to Khmelnytsky region follow further messages.#Khmelnitskaya This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
